title: Akamai quarterly revenue rises 7.7 percent
text:
February 6, 2018 / 9:16 PM / Updated 19 minutes ago Akamai quarterly revenue rises 7.7 percent Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Reuters) - Akamai Technologies Inc ( AKAM.O ) reported a 7.7 percent rise in quarterly revenue on Tuesday as the company benefited from higher demand for its cloud security services. 
However, the companyâ€™s net income fell to $19.1 million, or 11 cents per share, in the fourth quarter ended Dec. 31, from $91.6 million, or 52 cents per share, a year earlier. 
The fourth quarter was impacted by a $52 million restructuring charge and a $26 million provisional charge associated with the U.S. tax code overhaul. 
Revenue rose to $663.5 million from $616.1 million. Reporting by Sonam Rai and Arjun Panchadar in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila
